title: Flight Delay Causes Missed Tour
description: A customer's flight was delayed, causing them to miss a non-refundable tour they booked as part of a package. They want a refund for the tour.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's entire package booking, including flight and tour details.
Verify the flight delay and confirm it was the cause of the missed tour.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the flight's arrival time was after the tour's start time.

tasks.description: Even though the tour was non-refundable, override the policy and issue a refund for the tour portion of the package as a gesture of goodwill due to the airline disruption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes a partial refund for the missed activity.
